original_text: When Jesus had said all this, he went on in front of them. He was going towards Jerusalem.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 말씀을 하시고 예루살렘을 향하여 앞서서 가시더라

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had said all this
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 이 모든 것을 말하셨을 때

sentences.original_text: he went on in front of them
